entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 1:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to periods of freezing rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to a few rain showers and flurries this evening then to a few flurries after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
